title: Outdoor Sundeck w/ Lounge Furniture, Online Rental Payments
map_address: 5474 Oakley Industrial Blvd near Senoia Rd
posting_body: Look No Further for Luxury Living in Fairburn
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1252 Sq.
Discover an unrivaled living experience at The Parke at Oakley, where contemporary style meets condominium-quality finishes.
In each sprawling one, two, and three bedroom pet-friendly apartment, you’ll find a flexible floor plan that features modern perks, a clean color palette, and a comfortable layout.
Upgrade your modern living experience in Fairburn, Georgia, when you become a resident of The Parke at Oakley.

From our ideal location near the I-85, sitting just outside Atlanta, to our appealing community amenities, like the onsite car care center and zero entry swimming pool, The Parke at Oakley offers an upscale retreat you’ll be proud to call home.
Please contact our leasing team to learn more about our restricted breed list and applicable fees and deposits.
We look forward to welcoming both you and your pets to our community!
